title: Food Compass
summary: In a hurry to find food nearby? Let Food Compass show you the way!
description: Whatever you're the mood for, Food Compass can point the way there. All you have to do is follow!Using Food Compass is easier than navigating Maps. Simply open the app, and with little more than two taps, you'll be on your way. Specify (through voice, search box, or Tinder-like interface) what you're in the mood for (ex: Chipotle, Cheesecake Factory, pizza, sushi, etc), select from a list of nearby restaurants, and follow the arrow. The app reports the remaining distance as you near your destination.With Android Wear support, we're making it even more convenient to get around. Put your phone away, and let your watch guide you to your destination.Search. Point. Go - Food Compass.
descriptionHTML:
Whatever you're the mood for, Food Compass can point the way there. All you have to do is follow!

Using Food Compass is easier than navigating Maps. Simply open the app, and with little more than two taps, you'll be on your way. Specify (through voice, search box, or Tinder-like interface) what you're in the mood for (ex: Chipotle, Cheesecake Factory, pizza, sushi, etc), select from a list of nearby restaurants, and follow the arrow. The app reports the remaining distance as you near your destination.

With Android Wear support, we're making it even more convenient to get around. Put your phone away, and let your watch guide you to your destination.

Search. Point. Go - Food Compass.
comments: Problem I like the idea behind this app, but it's not working for me. Every time I try to find a restaurant it crashes. Can you guys please fix it? So I can enjoy your awesome app.
Great idea The Tinder-like card swipe wasn't apparent at first, and it sometimes seems to point in the wrong direction. Also needs metric measurements.
Amazingly designed and easy to use Easiest one of the best designed apps I have ever used!
